video.title: America's Test Kitchen
video.synopsis: Chef Christopher Kimball solves kitchen conundrums by reverse engineering "bad food" and transforming it into delicious dishes.

episodes.synopsis: The cooks discover a quicker way to make succulent beef bourguignon, Adam reviews potato ricers, and Chris outlines the science of potato starch.
episodes.title: Meat and Potatoes with Panache

episodes.synopsis: Julia shows how to dazzle dinner guests with a showstopping chocolate-espresso dacquoise, while Chris explains the science behind egg whites.
episodes.title: A Fancy Finale

episodes.synopsis: What's the secret to the perfect fluffy omelet? The cooks offer tips for making several styles of eggs and share their favorite egg-related gadgets.
episodes.title: Three Ways with Eggs

episodes.synopsis: The test cooks put a grown-up twist on a pair of childhood favorites, serving up crisp whole-wheat pizza and a palate-pleasing grilled cheese.
episodes.title: A Modern Take on Pizza and Grilled Cheese

episodes.synopsis: See why the French cook chicken and stuffing in a pot, and learn how to make a French-style pork stew that's hearty without being too heavy.
episodes.title: French-Style Dutch Oven Dinners

episodes.synopsis: Visit a Boston bakery to learn the secret to delicate Florentine lace cookies, and find the perfect compromise between tender and crunchy biscotti.
episodes.title: From an Italian Bakery

episodes.synopsis: The kitchen crew tries out stovetop smokers and serves up scrumptious recipes for herb-crusted salmon and crispy potato latkes.
episodes.title: Salmon and Latkes

episodes.synopsis: Ready for a hearty meal? Watch as the chefs cook up a juicy-yet-crunchy chicken Parmesan and creamy pasta alla Norcina.
episodes.title: Classic Italian Fare

episodes.synopsis: Test cook Julia puts her spin on Julia Child's classic stuffed turkey recipe, while gadget guru Lisa reviews the best turkey tools.
episodes.title: Revisiting Julia Child's Roast Turkey

episodes.synopsis: The test cooks serve up decadent recipes for a silky-smooth chocolate tart and rich butterscotch pudding alongside reviews of cool kitchen tools.
episodes.title: Decadent Desserts

episodes.synopsis: Spice things up in the kitchen with pepper-crusted beef tenderloin and a butterflied leg of lamb, and see which pepper grinders perform the best.
episodes.title: Special-Occasion Roasts

episodes.synopsis: The test cooks reveal their secrets for a rich-tasting wild rice and mushroom soup and a creamy cauliflower soup made without cream.
episodes.title: Let's Start with Soup

episodes.synopsis: Test cook Becky finds a way to lighten up spaghetti carbonara, Julia whips up a summery puttanesca, and Chris hones his olive-tasting chops.
episodes.title: It's Pasta Night!

episodes.synopsis: Learn the trick to keeping oatmeal muffins moist, make a more satisfying granola at home, and test the best drip coffee makers on the market.
episodes.title: Oatmeal Muffins and Granola

episodes.synopsis: Tease out deep and complex flavors with spoon-worthy recipes for Italian wedding soup and Spanish-style lentil and chorizo soup.
episodes.title: Hearty Spanish and Italian Soups, Revamped

episodes.synopsis: You won't have to hit the road for a great Philly cheesesteak or a New England lobster roll after learning how to make them at home.
episodes.title: Great American Sandwiches

episodes.synopsis: The test cooks serve up garlicky roasted shrimp and oven-steamed mussels, while Adam reveals his favorite cast-iron skillets.
episodes.title: At the Seafood Counter

episodes.synopsis: Add some panache to weekend mornings with easy, no-knead brioche, fluffy lemon ricotta pancakes and the best-tasting bacon on the market.
episodes.title: Elegant Brunch Favorites

episodes.synopsis: Doc visits a Cuban chef for pointers while the test cooks prepare a tangy picadillo and reveal a trick for keeping shredded beef moist.
episodes.title: Spiced-Up Cuban Cuisine

episodes.synopsis: Jack samples BBQ sauce with Chris while the chefs prepare sweet and tangy barbecued chicken and cornbread made with fresh corn.
episodes.title: Best Barbecued Chicken and Cornbread

episodes.synopsis: Bright flavors abound as Bridget grills lemon chicken with rosemary and Julia puts a summery spin on beets by adding lemon and almonds.
episodes.title: Easy Summer Supper

episodes.synopsis: Bridget shows how to quickly tenderize ribs before grilling, and Julia shares tips for perfect grilled corn with basil and lemon butter.
episodes.title: Quick and Easy Rib Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Julia shares secrets for making lush summer berry trifles without the mush, and Christopher makes the perfect fresh peach pie.
episodes.title: Summertime Desserts

episodes.synopsis: Bridget solves the challenges of pork tenderloin, Dan adds an unusual ingredient to his glazed chicken breasts, and Adam reviews chef's knives.
episodes.title: Grilled and Glazed

episodes.synopsis: The team taps into bold flavors with Middle Eastern lamb kofte and Tunisian-style grilled vegetables, while Chris tests his taste buds on hummus.
episodes.title: Grilling Goes International

episodes.synopsis: Julia unlocks the secrets to perfect lemon chiffon pie, while Bridget finds a better way to work blueberries into a Bundt cake.
episodes.title: Sweet American Classics
